senses.sense_definition: Not mixed with other substances, elements, or feelings; pure.

examples.text: The chef prefers to use <w>unmixed</w> spices to control the flavor profile exactly.
Winning the lottery turned out to be not an <w>unmixed</w> blessing for the family.

senses.sense_definition: Relating to an ideal in a commutative ring where all associated prime ideals have the same height.

examples.text: The professor explained the properties of an <w>unmixed</w> ideal during the algebra lecture.
This theorem is only applicable if the local ring is <w>unmixed</w>.
